mcq.Question: Located in North America, the United States is bordered on the west by the _______ and to the east by the Atlantic Ocean.
mcq.originalSentence: Located in North America, the United States is bordered on the west by the Pacific Ocean and to the east by the Atlantic Ocean.

mcq.Question: The New England states, namely _______, Maine, Massachusetts, New Hampshire, Rhode Island, and Vermont, became home to European settlers who came in search of religious freedom.
mcq.originalSentence: The New England states, namely Connecticut, Maine, Massachusetts, New Hampshire, Rhode Island, and Vermont, became home to European settlers who came in search of religious freedom.

mcq.Question: The Southern states, namely Alabama, Arkansas, Florida, Georgia, _______, Louisiana, Mississippi, North Carolina, South Carolina, Tennessee, Virginia, and West Virginia, were all states which struggled after the Civil War.
mcq.originalSentence: The Southern states, namely Alabama, Arkansas, Florida, Georgia, Kentucky, Louisiana, Mississippi, North Carolina, South Carolina, Tennessee, Virginia, and West Virginia, were all states which struggled after the Civil War.

mcq.Question: The Midwest comprises the states of _______, Indiana, Iowa, Kansas, Michigan, Minnesota, Missouri, Nebraska, North Dakota, Ohio, South Dakota, and Wisconsin.
mcq.originalSentence: The Midwest comprises the states of Illinois, Indiana, Iowa, Kansas, Michigan, Minnesota, Missouri, Nebraska, North Dakota, Ohio, South Dakota, and Wisconsin.

mcq.Question: The Western states, including Alaska, Colorado, California, Hawaii, _______, Montana, Nevada, Oregon, Utah, Washington, and Wyoming make up a diverse landscape.
mcq.originalSentence: The Western states, including Alaska, Colorado, California, Hawaii, Idaho, Montana, Nevada, Oregon, Utah, Washington, and Wyoming make up a diverse landscape.
